select b.board_no, b.board_title, e.emp_name, b.board_regdate, b.board_hit from board b, category c, emp e
where b.category_no = c.category_no and e.emp_no = b.emp_no and b.board_no > 0 and b.board_deldate is null and b.category_no = #{category_no} order by board_no desc

if.if: and ( board_title like '%'|| #{keyword}||'%' OR board_contents like '%'|| #{keyword}||'%')

mapper.update: update board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_contents = #{board_contents} where board_no=#{board_no}
update board set board_deldate=SYSDATE where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select count(board_no) from board where board_no > 0 and category_no = #{category_no}
mapper.update: update board set board_hit = board_hit +1 where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select fullname from board_file where board_no = #{board_no} order by regdate
